Full-stack development is an ideal niche on Upwork.  Many customers are hiring full-stack developers to work on their products. This requires a long term work engagement because such customers are working on their ERPs, EMR softwares, custom softwares to manage their operations, backend of mobile apps, some of them developing their own APIs, and a lot of other products are being developed that require full-stack developers.  If you can provide them a good value then a single client can pay you $3000-$5000 a month to keep you engaged full time.  You just need to find a couple of long term clients and they can grow your Upwork profile rapidly.   If you search freelancers' profiles of full-stack on Upwork, then you can see a lot of Pakistani freelancers between $100k-$500 profile earnings. They all started from 0.  There is still enough space available for many other developers considering customers' requirements in this area. Its like never ending tale.   Spare your extra hours after job to focus on freelancing so you can also avail the opportunity and start your personal revenue stream.   hashtag #Upworkopportunity  hashtag #Freelancing
